infos.value: Oww... M-my shoulder...
Damn, mine as well!
...The commander of «Calorum», Lu'Cia, I take it?
And you are?
No, wait. I think I have an idea. The commander of «Nitor», Adelard, right?
The Vermilion Devil... So you used your own comrades as decoys to get this far.
Calling them "decoys" is regrettable. If life is truly so precious, then one should not step foot on the battlefield.
The motivation behind this attack was neither to take this fortress nor to take out Hourne soldiers. Isn't that so?
Oh, so you've gotten it.
I wanted to see which force would come to the rescue and how fast.
That's all I needed to know. I could take a fort as sad as this any time.
Even now you're putting on a brave front? You're the last one left.
You think you stand a chance against me one-on-one?
Of course. Do you know why they call me the Vermilion Devil? Allow me to show you.
If you're that eager to die...
Then die right here!
A-amazing! He's repelling lead bullets like they're nothing!
C-commander!?
I must say, you're quite skilled.
But you're no more than a spellblade. You're already a bit behind the times.
We'll be invading Hourne shortly.
But you don't have to worry. When we do, I'll be the one to kill your family.
Salire!
...Is that the name of someone you want to protect?
...Nngh!
...Tch.
So this one...is Salire. Interesting.
Come on, Salire. Let's end it here.
Hahaha. Our first time fighting hand in hand, huh?
Do be careful not to say things that could be misconstrued.
